summary.span: 表示一个用于用户激活、许可证绑定和其他权限管理操作的安全客户端会话。

span.span: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法旨在与已激活的用户一起使用，例如在 返回的列表中提供。This method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from . 对尚未激活的用户使用备用 方法。Use the alternate method for users that are not yet activated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建安全环境。The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment. span.span: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法适用于尚未激活的新用户。This method is intended for new users that are not yet activated. 激活新用户包括用于获取用户证书和客户端许可证证书的往返服务器事务。Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate. 如果用户已激活，则可以使用备用 方法，如在 返回的列表中提供。The alternate method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法创建安全环境。The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubsecenv)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubSecEnv](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubsecenv)]

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 完成后，应用程序应调用 。The application should call when finished with the . 调用 后，垃圾回收器将回收分配给 的资源。After is called, resources allocated to the are reclaimed by the garbage collector. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 在发布 的最后一个引用之前，始终调用 。Always call before the last reference to the is released. 如果未调用 ，则在垃圾回收器调用实例的 方法之前，不会释放分配给 的资源。If is not called, resources allocated to the will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
